newsitem.title: USA: Valspar Corp completes Sureguard purchase.
newsitem.headline: Valspar Corp completes Sureguard purchase.

text.p: Valspar Corp said Thursday it completed its acquisition of Sureguard Inc, a manufacturer of industrial coatings, for an undisclosed price.
Sureguard, which posted annual revenues of $10 million in 1996, is located in Grand Prairie, Texas.
It shares were trading down 1/8 Thursday at 57-1/8.
